review:
My dad had Heart problem

We consult many Doctors but I was not satisfied with  Doctors suggestion ,after that we met Dr Prasad Bhat sir No words to describe his kindness n sympathy very beautiful he explain my dad Problem

My wife had thyroid issue so went to hospital. ********* *** **** ** *** ******. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. I can definitely recommend doctor to my family or friends. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. We already had blood test rep, my wife is fine now. There was not much waiting time in the hospital, it was for 5- 10 minutes. Hospitality was good. Diet was suggested to have fruits, exercise, and yoga was suggested. Doctor was also friendly in treating her.
sir is really great he as a nice patience and listen to the patient and clear all the doubts am satisfied

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A Good friendly doctor who treats with great pleasure for cardiac treatment in yeshwantapur.........
